required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Objectives of the Cartilage Repair Registry is to Report Long Term Efficacy and Safety of Cartilage Repair Procedures in Registry Patients

brief_summary.textblock: The objectives of the Cartilage Repair Registry is to report the long term efficacy and safety of cartilage repair procedures in Registry patients.

primary_outcome.measure: Physician assessment of effectiveness of autologous chondrocyte implantation
primary_outcome.description: Overall assessment of the patient by the physician based on knee examination and progress of rehabilitation

primary_outcome.measure: Physician assessment of effectiveness of autologous chondrocyte implantation
primary_outcome.description: Overall assessment of the patient by the physician based on knee examination and progress of rehabilitation

primary_outcome.measure: Physician assessment of effectiveness of autologous chondrocyte implantation
primary_outcome.description: Overall assessment of the patient by the physician based on knee examination and progress of rehabilitation

secondary_outcome.measure: Patient assessment of effectiveness of autologous chondrocyte implantation
secondary_outcome.description: Overall assessment of the patient by the patient based on pain, swelling, giving-way, grinding, stiffness, catching and locking and quantity of exercise

intervention.description: Each Carticel vial of autologous cultured chondrocytes contains approximately 12 million cells implanted into the defect and secured with a periosteal flap.

study_pop.textblock: Registry of patients with diagnosis of chondral injury.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- All registry patients meeting the cohort definition at the pre-operative visit will be included on the overall summary tables for the patient cohort
Exclusion Criteria:
- All registry patients meeting the cohort definition at the pre-operative visit will be included on the overall summary tables for the patient cohort

facility.name: Registry contains data from patients whom were implanted by 1123 surgeons in the U.S. and also data captured on patients treated by 154 surgeons in 15 other countries.
